== Mogral (CT) (627129) ==

Mogral (CT) is a town in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 4.19 sq. km. and harbouring 1627 households with total population of 8912 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 643 km. Male population is 4223 and female population is 4689. Scheduled Caste population is 321 and Scheduled Tribes population is 33. Census Location Code of the town is 627129<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Mangalore(m corp. + og) at a distance of 38 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 168 km. Railway station is at Kumbala at a distance of 1 km.
